root.name: Mahou Sensei Negima!? Neo-Pactio Fight!!
root.description: captioncaptioncaptionThis Negima Wii game is based on the anime/manga characters of the same name. It is a fighting game in the spirit of Harry Potter, where you attack using spells. It has a multiplayer mode supporting up to 4 players. There is little chance of a Western release, so an ability to decipher Japanese instructions is required.Features:Negima!? Neo-Pactio Fight!! is packed with magic battles, action, and some bits of hilarity.Negima Springfield and the other students of class 3-A engage in a 3D fighter where characters can use melee attacks, magic, and partners.10 playable characters with and 30 partners are featured in the game.Play in Story Mode or a Battle Mode.
